name: Drifting BMW Edition 2 - Car Racing and Drift Race
name_original: Drifting BMW Edition 2 - Car Racing and Drift Race
description:
Drifting BMW edition is back with a Second game, with improved visuals, more cars and new tracks! Also you can drift at night at each track!

Build your drift car and customize it to your likeing both visually and performance wise.

BODY PARTS
-Custom front and rear bumpers
-Spoilers
-Exhausts
-15 rims to select from and more to come.

PERFORMANCE UPGRADES
-Suspension upgrade
-Weight reduction, racing seats and roll cage
-Engine tuning

PAINTJOBS
-18 different colors for both the car and the rims (more colors are coming soon)

You earn money by drifting on a drift track and you can spend it on body parts, upgrades or paint jobs.
This game truly has the most realistic handling, and controlling the car is both fun and challenging, but if you've played realistic games before, this would be no challenge for you!
